name: DiscordOauth2
author: Rph <rphsoftware@gmail.com>
description: Implements a Discord Oauth2 login gate before users can make an account.

DiscordOauth2ClientId.description: The client ID for your Discord application

DiscordOauth2ClientSecret.description: The client secret for your Discord application

DiscordOauth2RedirectUri.description: The redirect URI application (URL to Special:DiscordAuthorize/Redirect )
